name: Selfie Generator
description: Generate selfie images using Gemini 3 Pro with face reference images for consistency.

geminiApiKey.description: Gemini API key. Falls back to GEMINI_API_KEY env var.

outputDir.description: Directory to save generated images. Default: /tmp/openclaw-selfies

proactiveSelfie.description: Probabilistic selfie on regular messages (not just heartbeat).

probability.description: Probability (0-1) of injecting a selfie hint per message. 0 = disabled.
